About

I am a recent graduate from The Iron Yard Atlanta Front End Engineering program and looking to join a dynamic and innovative development team. With my background in the Construction Industry as a Project Manager I have a passion for design and the drive to create and build. I am always looking to expand my craft, solve challenging problems and stay on the bleeding edge.

Skills

I am most proud of the final project that I was a part of called DwellingKit. It is an overall home management web application that allows its users to manage their house with easy to use reminders for warranties, events, and home maintenence with visual statistics based on your purchases, rooms, or the entire home.

Previous Experience

Before becoming a front-end developer, I worked as a project manager for a building contractor. I have a passion to create and build and have experience working in a high speed deadline-driven environment that requires accuracy, concentration and the will to succeed.

Pierre Construction Group Inc.
Project Manager
  • - Establish and maintain healthy relationships with new business and currents customers to understand their needs, ensure alignment on objectives, and manage ongoing project activities.
  • - Generates and distributes performance reports to customers and stakeholders in an accurate and timely manner.
  • - Create and analyze multiple tables and databases regarding clients, budgets, resources and assets to ensure all aspects of each project is equipped for success.
  • - Maintain and create daily and monthly reports to allow for monitoring of key factors of each project
  • - Plan, organize, and direct operational activities concerned with delivering the project to completion.
  • - Develop, analyze and monitor reports for key performance factors and conduct analysis to detect faults and create improvements.
